attributes.action: Rescind Gavin Williamson's proposed Knighthood, given his failure/s at Education
attributes.additional_details: This is the man who comprehensively failed to steer the public education and exam sectors through the challenges of the Covid pandemic and lockdown/s: surely more a disgrace than a case for any establishment reward?
attributes.background: We 'ordinary British people' have unfortunately been obliged to swallow a great deal of unsavoury / substandard political behaviour in recent years, but Williamson's havering ineptitude over our crucial Education sector was a glaring example that absolutely does not merit further reward.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
